DOC.brief_summary: The treatment breast cancer give time surgery , well adjuvant treatment ( radiotherapy , chemotherapy hormone therapy ) alone together . And patient tends lose weight , becomes depress , result increasingly debilitate picture . Therefore , present study aim investigate relationship physical exercise effect quality life patient breast cancer , underwent surgery least 6 month , patient still Tumor use adjuvant treatment submit physical exercise submit . The sample consist 25 50 female patient age 18 75 year . Patients submit initial quality life evaluation ( SF - 36 reduced version , Anxiety depression ( HAD Scale ) , Fatigue ( Piper Fatigue Scale ) , Pain ( Brief Inventory Pain ) , Body Composition ( Bioimpedance BYODINAMICS 450 ) And oxidative stress marker ( oxidize reduce glutathione , TBARS / MDA , Myeloperoxidase Creatinine ) , inflammatory marker ( IL1 , IL6 , IL8 , IL10 , MCP-1 TNF-α ) , hormone Estrogen , progesterone ) , blood test ( complete blood count ) 24 hour food recall ( 24hs food recall ) , perform maximum repetition test find initial workload adjust every 4 week evaluation load Completing 12 week train reevaluate follow initial evaluation . The data collect treat statistically α=5 % use software Stata 12.0 .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Training Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The patient allocate two group : exercise group ( intervention ) conventional treatment group ( active comparison ) . Intervention : The combined training program consist 12-week aerobic , resistive flexibility exercise , 3 session per week aerobic resistive training session ( supervised physical exercise coach ) 2 session per week Flexibility training ( unsupervised ) . As stretching session interspersed session aerobic weather training daytime period .
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer patient ; Sedentary ; Currently treatment clinical followup . Musculoskeletal injury disorder ; Mental illnesses ; Enrolled exercise program .
